Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
GenAI is readily available and does not require any wait time for response however it will never be 100% accurate to what we are learning in class so it can be used as another tool to aid you but I will always rely mostly on my teachers for help as they know exactly what it is I need to do to improve or get marks on an assignment. 

So it has improved my learning somewhat but it does not replace a teacher.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from a teacher is much more personal and specific however I dont feel particularly different from either.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response:
GenAI is only able to provide with general feedback and feedback based on the parameters that I set so it will never be perfect, mostly just do gauge where I stand in terms of a grade

A teacher will be very specific and personal giving exact details and to how I can improve to either get a better mark or improve a certain skill.
